title: add single-end paired-end seamless support
body:
### Description of feature

single-end paired-end workflows for: 

1. Mapping
2. Peak Calling

title: Default and alternative options for plotHeatmap
body:
### Description of feature

for deeptools plotHeatmap, there should be two options:

1. Default: Plot each sample to its called peaks (+/- sample's control if exists)
2. Alternative: Plot according to blueprints defined by the user in "heatmap_blueprint.yaml" file
